officialTitle: Comparative Evaluation of Dexamethasone and Dexmedetomidine as Adjuvants for Bupivacaine in Ultrasound Guided Infraorbital Nerve Block in Infants for Cleft Lip Repair
inclusionCriteria:
* American society of anesthesiologist (ASA) physical status I or II
* Must have minimum age of 1 Month
* Must have maximum age of 1 Year
exclusionCriteria:
* known allergy to any of drugs used
* coagulopathy
* any wound or infection related to puncture site
* major illness
* failure to gain consent of parents.
